body:
Version 0.2.0

  • NEW: Much easier onboarding and initial installation walkthrough with Easy and Advanced modes according to user experience.
  • NEW: More intuitive way of creating new columns.
  • NEW: GPT-5 and GPT-5.1 models now fully supported.
  • NEW: Column creation using AI and keyboard shortcuts (CMD+K) with more intuitive UI.
  • NEW: Zotero's linked files now get indexed automatically.
  • NEW: Faster AI responses - instant results with powerful models like llama-3.3-70b-versatile, openai/gpt-oss-20b, and flash/lite versions from Gemini and OpenAI.
  • NEW: Unindexed files by Zotero now get automatically indexed in the background for the entire library.
  • NEW: Column header context menu option: AI Fill Empty Cells.
  • NEW: AI Answers now stream in real-time instead of appearing all at once.
  • NEW: Modern and easier-to-use interface.
  • NEW: New sidebar chat view replacing floating windows.
  • NEW: Fixed startup database connection errors with better fallback logic.
  • NEW: Much faster startup time.
  • NEW: Ready-made templates for AI Prompts to help you get started quickly.
  • NEW: Added Perplexity, LM Studio, and Ollama dedicated models options.
  • NEW: More embedding models including MTEB leaderboard top performers (via Together AI).

Version 0.1.9

  • NEW: Drag and drop PDF files and create custom collections without needing a Zotero account.
  • New: More collections customization options for icons and colors (right click).
  • Improved: AI processing functions and models max token size.
  • Improved: Lots of small UI uplifting changes.
  • Fixed: Lots of bugs no longer exist.

Version 0.1.8

  • Fixed: Some PDFs won't be reindexed
  • Fixed: Localhost API Key issue
  • Fixed: Abnormal special characters from some AI responses

Version 0.1.7

  • Added: DeepSeek and Qwen direct model APIs
  • Added: Gemini latest 2.5 models from within native API
  • Added: Models support for Openweb-UI
  • Fixed: Claude models not displayed after inserting API key
  • Fixed: Zotero data directory selection issue on Windows devices
  • Improved: Localhost embedding models support

Version 0.1.6

  • Added: All major AI models now available
  • Added: Optional text embeddings
  • Improved: Better support for local models
  • Added: Expanded display mode
  • Improved: Better syncing with Zotero including unavailable PDFs issues
  • Added: More advanced options (under settings)
  • Improved: Better app performance
  • Improved: Revamped UI
  • Added: Extended free access (now 14 days)
